Paul Garnet Henderson, CM OOnt (amụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 28, afọ 1943) bụ onye Canada bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu ice hockey

Onye na-agba ọsọ n'aka ekpe, Henderson gbara oge iri na atọ na National Hockey League (NHL) maka Detroit Red Wings, Toronto Maple Leafs na Atlanta Flames na ise na World Hockey Association (WHA) maka Toronto Toros na Birmingham Bulls
Ọ gbara ihe karịrị otu puku egwuregwu n'etiti nnukwu egwuregwu abụọ ahụ, gbaa goolu 376 na akara 758
Henderson gbara bọọlụ na NHL All-Star Games abụọ ma bụrụ onye otu Hamilton Red Wings nke meriri Memorial Cup dị ka onye na-eto eto.
A maara Henderson nke ọma maka iduzi Team Canada na mmeri n'afọ 1972 Summit Series megide Soviet Union
Egwuregwu a na-egwu n'oge Agha Nzuzo, a na-ele usoro ahụ anya dị ka agha maka ma hockey na ọdịbendị kachasị elu

Henderson gbara goolu mmeri n'egwuregwu nke isii, nke asaa na nke asatọ, nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Canada ma mee ka ọ bụrụ dike mba: The Canadian Press họpụtara ya dị ka "oge egwuregwu nke narị afọ" ma mee ka o nweta ọtụtụ otuto
A kpọbatara Henderson ugboro abụọ n'ime Ụlọ Egwuregwu nke Canada: n'afọ 1995 n'otu n'otu na na afọ 2005 yana ndị egwuregwu niile nke otu Summit Series
A nabatara ya na International Ice Hockey Federation Hall of Fame n'afọ 2013.
Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ, Henderson ghọrọ onye ozi, ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali na onye edemede na-agbaso ọrụ ịgba egwu ya
O so dee akwụkwọ atọ metụtara hockey ma ọ bụ ndụ ya
E mere Henderson onye otu Order of Canada n'afọ 2012 na Order of Ontario n'afọ 2014.
